DataSourcePortable.Name: Fórmula Apuração
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT TR.HANDLE,
 TR.Z_GRUPO,
 TR.NOME,
 TR.TABELA,
 TR.CAMPO,
 T.NOME NOMETABELA,
 C.NOME NOMECAMPO
 FROM TR_FILTROS TR,
 Z_TABELAS T,
 Z_CAMPOS C
 WHERE TR.TABELA = T.HANDLE
 AND TR.CAMPO = C.HANDLE
 ORDER BY TR.NOME" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="Z_GRUPO" From="A" Path="Z_GRUPO" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="TABELA" From="A" Path="TABELA" /> <Field Alias="CAMPO" From="A" Path="CAMPO" /> <Field Alias="NOMETABELA" From="A" Path="NOMETABELA" /> <Field Alias="NOMECAMPO" From="A" Path="NOMECAMPO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
